name: Fantasy Stars: Battle Arena
summary:
"Welcome to Fantasy Stars, where you can battle it out in real time full-on head-to-head multiplayer action. Collect and upgrade cards to expand your deck, and take on the world in this fantasy world battle royal. Team up with friends for 2v2 battles, or challenge your friends in friendly matches. Climb the ranks and enter new arenas where strong opponents are waiting.

FANTASY STARS FEATURES
- Send troops to battle to defeat your opponent
- Control and micro your hero to change the tide of battle
- Collect and upgrade cards
- Open chests for new cards and upgrades
- Make friends and enter battle together in friendly 1vs1 or exciting 2vs2 matches
- Learn from the best summoners by watching replays"
